body: @ezyang Yes makes sense. If I have understood correctly we should add all the gradient functions we will expose(now or in future) via a separate module called `grad` and add `grad` to [functional.py](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/functional.py) so that we can enable something like `F.grad.conv2d_input` etc. Does that sound correct?
